Getting Started

Get Basscss from one of these sources:

Download Source

Clone from Github:

git clone https://github.com/jxnblk/basscss.git

CDN link:

https://TK

Vanilla CSS

Include basscss.min.css out-of-the-box or use the unminified basscss.css and edit it how you see fit. For lighter-weight projects use basscss-lite.min.css, which only includes base type and layout styles. Manually adjust the font stack and theme styles to customize the look and feel.

Rework

Basscss is built with Rework with these dependencies:

  • Rework NPM
  • Rework Custom Media
  • Rework Vars
  • Rework Plugin Colors
  • Rework Calc

Getting started with Rework (TK)

Sass

Import the files found in the TK folder as partials. Sass variables are no longer supported in version 4 and up.

Base

Base styles handle default structural considerations for HTML elements.

Utilities

Utilities are single-purpose styles to handle common layout tasks.

Modules

Modules are more complex layout styles that are tied to markup structure.

Themes

Themes are styles for colors, borders and other decorative styles.

Basscss comes with a simple, lightweight theme. Use this as a guide when creating custom themes.
